title: Connect 4 React
description: My first site using state within React. When I learn a new language or library I usually create some version of Connect 4 to learn more about how the language works. In fact Connect 4 was the first website I ever created!

title: Utah Pumpkins
description: Every year my family grows and carves hundreds of pumpkins so I wanted to build a site to show them off. It was also a great opportunity to become more familiar with Contentful.

title: Bruner Dynamics
description: My first Gatsby demo site. The site utilizes GraphQL, gatsby-image, and Emotion to make it super fast.

title: Clearlink
description: At Clearlink I've worked on an assortment of sites including USDISH, Your Local Security, and Frontier Bundles.

title: Calldrip
description: While working at Calldrip I helped create a product called Dynamic Numbers which would dynamically show each unique visitor to our clients website a unique phone number. Those phone numbers could then be tracked for precise customer tracking.

title: Top Shelf Logic
description: A landing page I created for a local small business using a bootstrap theme.
